reviewText: Love both of these Christmas Movies and that there are 2 movies on one DVD.!!!Single Santa is a movie about Beth who is a widow and has a son and not into Christmas until she meets a guy who changes everything for her and who happens to be the son of Santa and she eventually becomes Mrs ClausBoyfriend for Christmas is about a girl named Holly who makes a wish for a boyfriend and 20 years later it becomes true with the help from Santa and chance meetings with this guy.  2 Must See Holiday Movies.!!!
summary: Single Santa Seeks Mrs Claus/A Boyfriend for Christmas

reviewText: Both of these movies are an awesome addition to a growning Holiday movie library."Single Santa Seeks Mrs. Claus" is a very heartwarming story about keeping the belief in Santa Claus alive, along with a love story that is both touching and fulfilling.  Well acted and great story line."A Boyfriend For Christmas" was a definate must have movie to me.  I love the story and the plot unfolds in a way that keeps your interest alive as you see Kelli Williams and Patrick Muldoon realize how fate had brought them together again, after many years had passed.  Her Christmas wish finally came true.
